job.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist
job.description:
What we expect from you::
Proven experience in recruitment within iGaming, IT, fintech, digital entertainment, or technical agencies
Demonstrated capability in hiring roles such as software engineering, product, QA, data, risk, compliance, fraud, or operations
Strong expertise in international sourcing and engaging talent across multiple markets
Proficiency in LinkedIn Recruiter, ATS platforms, Boolean search, and modern search tools
Skilled in structured interviews and evidence-based candidate assessment
Ability to manage multiple vacancies with high accuracy and strong organisational discipline
Clear, timely, and professional communication with candidates and stakeholders
Comfort operating in fast-paced and dynamic environments
Strong prioritisation, documentation habits, and process reliability

About the role::
We are seeking a highly skilled
Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist
to manage end-to-end hiring for technical, operational, and specialist positions. The position focuses on precise execution of the hiring process, global sourcing of scarce talent, and the application of structured assessment methods. You will work closely with hiring managers, ensure full process compliance, and contribute to onboarding implementation and employer-branding activities that strengthen our market presence.
What's in it for you:
Flat structure with minimal bureaucracy
Opportunity to influence hiring quality and market reach
Direct contribution to recruitment performance and talent acquisition capability
Chance to support the growth of our brand
Clear impact on team development and organisational outcomes
What you will do:
Manage the full recruitment cycle for marketing, technical, product and operational roles.
Conduct structured intake discussions and drive efficient screening, interviewing, and offer processes.
Source talent internationally through targeted outreach, talent mapping, Boolean search, and professional networks.
Apply structured interviewing methods and provide evidence-based assessments to hiring managers.
Ensure accurate documentation, process compliance, and timely communication with candidates and stakeholders.
Support onboarding implementation and contribute to smooth offboarding processes where relevant.
Collaborate on employer-branding initiatives to strengthen market visibility and candidate engagement.

What we offer::
A no bureaucracy work environment
Competitive salary
Flexible working hours
Hybrid work setup; brand-new office in Ülemiste City
Diverse and inclusive workplace
Sports compensation via Stebby
28 calendar days of annual leave
Complimentary company merchandise
